bodyheading: Collaborated with a team to develop, maintain, and debug code for multiple projects that read vehicle data stored within SQL Server and Cassandra databases, then transforming it into various formats for downstream applications.
accomplishments: Contributed clean and efficient Java code for multiple data extraction projects utilizing SQL Server and Cassandra, transforming vehicle and related data for downstream applications
Modified and maintained SQL queries to support evolving data requirements
Migrated legacy projects and applications from Tomcat (Java 8) to Spring Boot (Java 21), as well as resolving various Maven vulnerabilities
Reduced CI/CD pipeline build times by over 75% by implementing a test suite using Mockito and JUnit to decouple database queries from test cases
Created and maintained test cases using JUnit for automated testing to ensure reliable and accurate outputs
Setup and deployed projects to production environments using Docker and GitLab CI/CD,  monitored deployment containers and pods via Rancher
Performed bug analysis and fixed them via the debugger across multiple projects
